column2: The  Petitioner  had  filed  this  application  against  the  Respondents,  as  the
Respondents  had  failed  to  appoint  him  for  the  post  of  Senior  Lecturer
(Grade II) of the Department of Education.
On the said grounds the Petitioner had sought the following reliefs prayed
for in the petition dated 17th September 2020.
The reliefs sought by the petition are as follows;
